channel.title: Drink Mixing Skill(need everyone's help :D)
channel.description:
[size=15pt]This has already been made, so I'm recreating it w00t[/size]
Hello everyone. One of the players of my server suggested to me this skill. Here's what I'm thinking. If you use one potion with another, you make a drink(and here's a reason I need everyone, I don't know every drink know to RuneScape.) Strength Potion(4) + Defence Potion(4) -> Beer Level 1 Drink Mixing required. Adds 50 xp to skill 25. Most servers have 24 skills, so 25 is necessary, 26 if it's a server with 25 skills. This skill will go up to 99(probably the best healing drink there is) You would also be able to make beers, and different drinks(such as fruit blasts, gnome drinks)
What I need help with: The coding The potions used The drinks made The levels required Where stuff is added Everything else
People who have helped(need to be included in the tut I'll make) Me -T X(made Drink-Mixing v3) -Mmcgrady1(if that's his name, I was told he's made this before) - - - - - - -
Please post anything you can help with, or if you're willing to help with whatever. Also if you like this idea or not.

item.title: Drink Mixing Skill(need everyone's help :D)
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

Lol, I don’t know who has previously created this skill. What’s wrong with this code?

else if(itemUsed == 24 && useWith == 113) { if(playerLevel[25] >= 0) { deleteItem(24, getItemSlot(24), 1); deleteItem(113, getItemSlot(113), 1); addItem(1917, 1); addSkillXP(100, 25); } else { sendMessage("You need 0 Drink Mixing to make beer"); } }[br][size=1]Posted on: July 12, 2007, 04:35:09 PM[/size][hr]Here’s a progression bump

I have added everything except using the ingredients to add the item. I need those codes!!!

I have added:
-Says you’ve leveled up after level ups
-It’s skill 25
-That’s about it lol[br][size=1]Posted on: July 12, 2007, 05:12:40 PM[/size][hr]I need someone to type up some useItem with Item to make the drinks, and add xp and all that.
Has to not affect parseIncomingPackets

Read full topic

item.title: Drink Mixing Skill(need everyone's help :D)
item.dc:creator: @MMcgrady1 MMcgrady1
item.description:
@MMcgrady1 wrote:

[quote=“Taylor John0, post:1, topic:122528”][size=10pt]MY FRIEND MADE UP THIS SKILL DON’T LEECH IT CUZ IT’S MINE(SINCE MY FRIEND DOESN’T HAVE AN ACCOUNT HERE)[/size]

Hello everyone. One of the players of my server suggested to me this skill. Here’s what I’m thinking.
If you use one potion with another, you make a drink(and here’s a reason I need everyone, I don’t know every drink know to RuneScape.)
Strength Potion(4) + Defence Potion(4) -> Beer
Level 1 Drink Mixing required. Adds 50 xp to skill 25. Most servers have 24 skills, so 25 is necessary, 26 if it’s a server with 25 skills.
This skill will go up to 99(probably the best healing drink there is)
You would also be able to make beers, and different drinks(such as fruit blasts, gnome drinks)

What I need help with:
The coding
The potions used
The drinks made
The levels required
Where stuff is added
Everything else

People who have helped(need to be included in the tut I’ll make)
Me

Please post anything you can help with, or if you’re willing to help with whatever.
Also if you like this idea or not.[/quote]The beer mixing doesn’t make sense at all tbh. This sounds a lot like herblore also.
